name: Space Hook (Mimerkim)
description:
A game where you are trying to run away from asteroids crashing into your area, as they get closer you will get less space to move in.

Controls:

Keyboard & Mouse only

Left Mouse Button to Hook

Right Mouse Button to Unhook

Q Restart 

Space Jump

ESC or E Quit

Except for textures (from Quixel), everything was made in the Jam. Some materials were created in Unreal by having them just emit light.

An Entry for 

2021 Epic MegaJam

The rest was all made by me including game logic, models, animations, music, and the level.

Credits:

Textures used - Quixel https://quixel.com/

To apply textures Quixel Mixer was used https://quixel.com/mixer

Music made in Bosca Ceoil https://boscaceoil.net/

Model and animations made in Blender https://www.blender.org/

Game made in Unreal Engine 4 https://www.unrealengine.com/en-US/
